Translations.Text: Net, klyanus' dnem voskreseniya
i klyanus' dushoy poritsayushchey
Razve dumayet chelovek, chto My nikogda ne soberem yego kostey
Da, sposobny My podobrat' yego pal'tsy
No zhelayet chelovek rasputnichat' pered soboy
On sprashivayet, kogda den' voskreseniya
Vot kogda oslepitsya vzor
i zatmitsya luna
i ob"yedinyatsya solntse i luna
skazhet chelovek v tot den': "Kuda bezhat'
Tak net! Net ubezhishcha
K Gospodu tvoyemu v tot den' pribezhishche
Vozveshcheno budet cheloveku v tot den', chto on ugotoval vpered i otlozhil
Ved' chelovek togda samogo sebya nablyudatel'
I khotya by on izlozhil svoi izvineniya
Ne sheveli svoy yazyk s etim, chtoby uskorit' yego
Poistine, na Nas lezhit sobiraniye yego i chteniye
I kogda My chitayem yego, to sleduy za yego chteniyem
Zatem, poistine, na Nas lezhit yego raz"yasneniye
No net, vy lyubite toroplivuyu
i ostavlyayete poslednyuyu
Litsa v tot den' siyayushchiye
na Gospoda ikh vzirayushchiye
I litsa v tot den' mrachnyye
dumayut, chto sovershayetsya nad nimi sokrusheniye khrebta
Tak net! Kogda doydet ona do klyuchitsy
i skazhut, kto zaklinatel'
i podumayet on, chto eto - razluka
i soydetsya golen' s golen'yu
k Gospodu tvoyemu budet v tot den' prigon
